pullrequest.title: DRC Finals Demo: change "Next Test" to "Reset Arm"

content.raw:
I see this problem sometimes when the install isn't set up correctly and the arm is receiving nan commands.

When you use --verbose with this world, are there any error messages?

Is the handsim/models/mpl_haptix_right_forearm folder on your GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH?

Are haptix-comm and ignition-transport updated?
content.html:
